page.title: 19SCHOOLBOY LIFE IN 1985
page.content: My name is{Jon-Paul Griffiths.}I am {eleven years old}and I go to Weston JMI School, Hertfordshire. My day begins at 07:00 when I get up and go downstairs for a{breakfast}of Coco Pops, my favourite rice based cereal in cocoa powder, which I have with milk. I usually watch Breakfast Time {television.}At about 07:40, I wash, clean my teeth, dress for school and then watch more television until 08.30 when I leave the{house}.I{walk}from home and arrive at about 08.55 when the whistle is blown by a teacher on duty and I go in. Our class{timetable starts with mathematics and assembly each day. On somedays the Vicar takes {assembly}and we have hymn practise on Thursdays. Our{morning lessons}are usually formal Maths and English both before and after{break}which is at 10.30. I often have a drink and snack.
